nodes.desc: Shaping the future of Playlist Creation and Curation
Designing on the holistic user experience cross consumer-based apps and design systems for mobile platforms.
Crafting Across Platforms: Enhancing Desktop, Web, and the Spotify Tablet App.
Designing innovative experiences for Big Screens, Game Consoles, Speakers, and Smart Appliances.
Designing Experiences for Big Screens, Game Consoles, and iOS Devices

nodes.rawMarkdownBody: Co-lead the design of a new experience that keeps listening sessions fresh with personalized recommendations that perfectly match the vibe of an original playlist. It breathes new life into carefully curated playlists, shuffling tracks and adding new, perfectly tailored suggestions.

frontmatter.title: Designing a new foundation for Desktop

nodes.rawMarkdownBody: Spotify's desktop client holds a special place as one of the earliest and most cherished applications. By late 2018, our design efforts were split between two platforms: the beloved and feature-rich Desktop app, and the Web Player, a newer client built with modern technology, offering a lighter experience. Our mission was clear: to modernize, unify, and lay the foundation for future advancements, ensuring a seamless and cohesive user experience across both platforms.

Crafting a fresh experience tailored specifically for the iPad involved fine-tuning layouts to maximize the tablet's unique form factor, effectively utilizing the available screen space, and ensuring optimal usability and accessibility. Our objective was clear: to deliver a profound and inclusive experience accessible to all users.

Ensuring accessibility of our main brand color is paramount. Recent audits have highlighted substantial concerns regarding its usability for individuals with low vision, blindness, and visual impairments. Recognizing the importance of inclusivity, we embarked on a journey to address this issue. Our goal? To align with WCAG AA standards without compromising Spotify's distinctive identity and performance.

Viaplay embarked on a mission to fortify its brand identity and establish a cohesive visual presence across all platforms. Collaborating closely with the Lead Visual Designer, Art Director, and Creative Director, my responsibility was to translate this vision into a captivating user experience tailored specifically for mobile and tablet platforms.

Viaplay embarked on a journey to reinforce its brand presence and ensure a unified visual identity across all platforms. Collaborating closely with the Lead Visual Designer, Art Director, and Creative Director, my task was to extend this revitalized experience to larger screens and gaming consoles, enriching the user experience across diverse media environments.
